meanings.definition: Of or relating to the pupil of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The doctor examined her pupillary response to light.
meanings.sent2: The pupillary size can change in different lighting conditions.
meanings.sent3: The pupillary reflex was so quick, it seemed like magic!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes held a pupillary depth that seemed to reveal her emotions.
meanings.sent5: The pupillary constriction in bright light protects the eye.

meanings.definition: Involving or affecting the pupil of the eye.
meanings.sent1: The medication had a pupillary effect on her vision.
meanings.sent2: The pupillary dilation was a sign of arousal.
meanings.sent3: The pupillary changes made her look like a curious owl.
meanings.sent4: His pupillary response mirrored his excitement.
meanings.sent5: The pupillary reaction to fear was evident in her eyes.
